title: Error 183: Failed to Create Dump File
body: I've been experiencing this issue at least 3 times out of 5 games. It usually happens during ban-pick and I got auto-kicked out, lost 2 promotions up to now.  I tried re-install client, audio driver and delete Leaguegeclient.exe, and seems none of them works. HELPPPPPPP PLZZZZZ... can't live with getting banned by abandoning games for every other game I played..

replies.body: Same problem here. I've just totally reinstalled the game (even manually deleting all the trash folders related with LoL) and it still persists. At least they could turn off the LeavingBuster, I've lost a lot of ranked game for this error.

To all..... my problem seemed solved now. I'm currently using Win10 64bits, Nvidia 960. Haven't had this issue since I upgraded my windows and the only error I have had so far is a one time error that the client froze when I opened a capsule (no error msg pop-up from it, cannot regenerate it either)

What I've tried:
- No hardware updates. 
- At first I was on Win10, 32 bits. Starting to have this error since the client was updated to beta version
- Full repair from client --> didn't work
- Reinstall client --> didn't work
- Update Nvidia driver, reinstall Nvidia driver --> didn't work
- Downgrade to Win7, 32 bits --> didn't work
- Upgrade to Win10 64bits (for my school project.....) --> somehow have it fixed, at least for now
        - have Nvidia Cuda tool box installed for school work, not sure it contributes

Meanwhile, my 5 year Acer laptop with Win10 32bits & Win8 64bits later on, AMD Radeon, appears to have no issue throughout the time.

Hope it helps and good luck to all.....I feel your pain : (
same this has been messing me up and im starting to get really annoyed have found several threads but no solutions

Guys i had same problems for 6 months but i find fix atleast it worked for me my client is litlle bit laggy so when i did those things it helped me i change my lol compatibilyti to windows 7 , and on my client - general i enabled low spec mode , close client during game and chancged my client windows size to 1024 x 576 , i got no error 183 or crashes during champ select or ban select .. i hope it will work for you how it worked for me :) {{champion:19}} BTW SORRY FOR BAD ENGLISH ;(
Failed to create dump file  errer183
Riot please fix this.. im still getting it every like 3 or 4 games, ive lost so many promos because of it. I dont have internet problems or anything, please!
Help me pls .. Failed to creat dump file (error 183) how to fix it pls :'( so annoying dude .. and this issue the game get crash in champ select (ranked game)
same here, only ranked games. normal game work usually fine. maybe twice a day. but ranked game happens everytime during champion select. i dont think it is any hardware. maybe it is clients.

I didn't play as frequent as before due to study but when I'm back, still see the same error. I've sent a ticket a month ago but no one contacted me for anything. A very good point to say goodbye to this game

I still have the same issue.... I tried to completed uninstall MSI realTek and reinstall it again. Turns out that 183 was gone (temporarily) but turned to "An error occurred, do you want to send a report" error msg (something similar to that). Meanwhile that MSI setting didn't fit with my speaker well that speaker had horrible noise. I somehow fine tuned speaker with Environment = room, this 183 came back again..... feels like it relates to beta client + MSIï¼‹win10

That error about not being able to create a dump file is a sign that the bugsplat was trying to let you know that something crashed.....but then the bugsplat failed and wasn't able to create the error file. Situations like this can typically be fixed by running a repair through the client options, so give that a go and test it in a custom game to avoid any possible penalties. Let me know how it helps!

Thanks for the suggestion but unfortunately it didn't work either. It seems to only happen when the player before me just locked in his champion so don't know if it can be regenerated by custom games... but this error is soooooo annoying...

Hmmmm go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can look through your game logs a little deeper than I can to see what's going on so you'll be in good hands with them!
This issue has been happening for me since a few months, I sublitted a tocket, but nothing helped.
same happened to me, submitted a ticket but nothing happened, and u know what? school starts soooooon {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I lost a promotion right now because of this error again, riot, fix this otherwise im gonna delete and trashtalk this game forever, do u even listen to the communities problems? It took me so much time to get my promotions to plat 2 and now i lost the last promo games because of this error, how shame on you that we put so much money, effort and time on your game and you dont even listen to our problems, no wonder where the community are taking their behvaior from.
